thesis.description: Mycoplasma hominis se multiplie dons une culture de la lignée de cellules leucémiques de souris L5178Y et en provoque la lyse. La multiplication en milieu de culture est dépendente des cellules de souris et se manifeste après une diminution initiale d'unités formant une colonie. En sous-culture dans un milieu frais, les cellules leucémiques infectées amènent une multiplication de mycoplasmes sone perte de viabilité. L'inoculation de plus de 10^5 U.F.C. par ml couse un effet toxique sur les cellules L5178Y de même que la multiplication des mycoplasmas atteignant ce nombre, soit plus d'une U. F.C. par cellule, amène la lyse des cellules. L'addition d'un excès d'arginine, d'immun-sérum ou de chloramphénicol empêche la lyse des cellules. L'infection des cellules L5178Y couse un gonflement des mitochondries et la présence de structures lamellaires sont les seuls changements ultrastructuraux précedant le bris des cellules.

Mycoplasma hominis replicates in cultures of L5178Y cells, a mouse leukemic cell line and induces cell Iysis. Replication in tissue culture medium is dependent on the presence of mouse cells and occurs after an initial loss of colony forming units. On subculturing the infected leukemic cells in fresh medium, mycoplasma's replicate without loss of viability. The inoculation of more than 105 CFU per ml induces a toxic effect on L5178Y cells, while replicating mycoplasmas, which attain a similar level, i.e. more thon approximately one CFU per cell, exert a similar Iytic effect. The Iysis of these cells can be prevented by the addition of excess arginine, immune serum or chloramphenicol. The infection of L5178Y cells induces swelling of mitochondria and the presence of lamellar bodies, which are the only ultrastructural changes prior to cell disruption.
thesis.creator: Siddiqui, Mohammad Y.
thesis.subject: Microbiology and Immunology.
thesis.title: The replication of <<Mycoplasma hominis>> in L5178Y cultures a lytic interaction.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: La consommation d'oxygène dépendant de l'acetoacetate requiert la présence simultanée du 2-oxoglutarate et du malate pour l'obtention de taux de respiration maximum. Dans ces conditions, nous avons observé que (i) Pi et arsenate étaient stimulatuers, (ii) parapyruvate et arsenite étaient inhibiteurs et que cette inhibition n'était pas renversée par l'ATP, et (iii) la formation de 14C02 à partir de 14C-acetoacetate n'était pas détectable. Des expériences avec des pyruvates marqués différemment suggèrent que l'effet décrit en (iii) résulte de l'efflux d'intermédiaires intramitochondriaux du cycle de l'acide citrique en contrepartie de l'entrée du malate ajouté. […]

Acetoacetate-dependent oxygen consumption of mitochondria required presence of both 2-oxoglutarate and malate for maximal rates of respiration. Under these conditions, it was observed that (i) Pi and arsenate were stimulatory, (ii) parapyruvate and arsenite were inhibitory and this inhibition was not reversed by ATP, and (iii) formation of 14C02 from 14C-acetoacetate was not detectable. Experiments with differentially labeled pyruvate suggest that the effect described under (iii) resulted from the efflux of intramitochondrial intermediates of the citric acid cycle in exchange for the entry of added malate. […]
thesis.creator: Siddiqui, A. W.
thesis.subject: Experimental Medicine.
thesis.title: Acetoacetate oxidation by heart mitochondria.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Le système "adenyl cyclase-cyclic AMP" a été étudié, à plusieurs occasions au niveau de la thyroide du rat, mais plusieurs questions sont demeurées sans reponses. Parmi celles-ci une concerne la nature des substraits pour "cyclic AMP-dependent protein kinase" et s'il y a quelques changements avec une stimulation par l'hormone hypophysaire thyrotropin. […]

The adenyl cyclase-cyclic AMP system has been much studied in the rat thyroid but many questions remain unanswered. Included in these is the nature of the substrate(s) for cyclic AMP-dependent protein kinase and whether or not there is any change in that moiety with stimulation by thyrotropin. To investigate this problem, rats were fed either a control or a goitrogenic diet, i.e. containing propylthiouracil; the latter is known to effect chronic hypersecretion of thyrotropin through activation of the thyroid-hypophyseal feed-back system. […]
thesis.creator: Keleher, Catherine M.
thesis.subject: Physiology.
thesis.title: Factors modifying cAMP activity in the rat thyroid.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: On a examiné l'effet produit par la transplantation d'une tumeur d'ascite (type d'Ehrlich) sur la présence de cellules clonales hémopoitiques (cellules CFU-C) dans la moelle osseuse et la rate; ces cellules ont été identifiées par culture in vitro. Après transplantation, le nombre de cellules CFU-C donnant naissance à des colonies de granulocytesmacrophages (CFU-C) a diminué rapidement, puis est remonté graduellement. […]

The effect of Ehrlich ascites, tumor transplantation on the distribution of hemopoietic colony forming cells in the bone marrow and spleen was studied using, in vitro culture techniques. Following transplantation femoral marrow showed a rapid decline in the number of colony forming cells committed to granulocyte/macrophage differentiation (CFU-C), followed by a gradual recovery. Meanwhile the CFU-C content of the spleen increased continuously, reaching values 75 fold normal by day 9 after tumor transplantation. […]
thesis.creator: Keeb, Gloria F.
thesis.subject: Anatomy.
thesis.title: Effects of ehrlich ascites tumor bearing on the in vitro colony forming cells of host hemopoietic tissues.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: A. The syntheses of β-hydroxypropiovanillone (A) and β-hydroxypropioveratrone (B) have been carried out and their behaviour towards chemical reagents studied. B. Conversion of (A) and (B) into amorphous lignin-like products by acid and by alkali has been effected. C. Exceptional reactivity of the terminal carbinol group of the side chains of (A) and (B) has been demonstrated. D. A detailed study has been made of the stabilities of α-hydroxypropiovanillone, α-acetoxypropiovanillone, vanilloyl methyl ketone, their syringyl analogs, and various mixtures of these compounds, towards ethanolic hydrogen chloride under conditions of the standard "ethanolysis" procedure. E. Depolymerization of various amorphous maple ethanol lignin fractions into simpler units has been effected by ethanolic hydrogen chloride.
thesis.creator: West, Kenneth Albert.
thesis.subject: Chemistry.
thesis.title: Studies on lignin building units.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: The usual practice of smelting copper is to smelt for matte first. [...] Cutting down the copper content of slag by a few one-hundredths percent does not seem important at first glance. Since an enormous amount of slags is produced, its economic significance, however, can not be too over-estimated. It is the aim of the present investigation to throw some light on slag losses of copper. In view of the complexity of the problem, attempts are made to eliminate variables as much as possible. In ferrocalcic-silicate slags produced from matte-slag smelting, answers are sought for (1) whether oxidized copper could be distinguished from sulfide copper, (2) is sulfide copper dissolved or included, (3) what are effects of slag composition on copper content and viscosity, and (4) whether the slag could be cleaned by introducing some special agent or agents without recourse to re-melting.
thesis.creator: Yao, Yü-lin.
thesis.subject: Metallurgy.
thesis.title: Copper losses in slags.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: This paper deals mainly with the "T" network, and its design for phase shift and impedance transforming applications. Attention is directed to other circuits which yield to similar treatment. A number of formulas are presented which can tell the designer just what he wants to know. Some of the formulas may be new to the art, at any rate they have not been noticed in past or current publications. The formulas have a theoretical justification, and their utility has been proven in a number of years of practical design. The formulas are illustrated by a number of practical applications, one of which includes a simple method of estimating circuit efficiency. The method of dealing with losses is general and can be applied to any similar type of circuit.
thesis.creator: Farmer, Eric W.
thesis.subject: Electrical Engineering.
thesis.title: The design of matching networks for antennas and transmission lines.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: One of the most characteristic of trends in modern civilization has been the continued concentration of population in urban communities. All of the social sciences are concerned in their subject matter with this development, although some, such as demography, deal with it more directly than others. Many important social theories are attempts to explain the change in the mode of men’s relationships, occasioned by the wide diffusion of forms of thought and conduct generated by the processes of city life. [...]
thesis.creator: Finestone, Harold.
thesis.subject: Sherbrooke County, Québec -- Population.
Sherbrooke County, Québec -- Economic conditions.
Eastern Townships (Québec) -- Economic conditions.
Eastern Townships (Québec) -- Population.
thesis.title: Trends in the population structure of the Sherbrooke subregion.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Optimum conditions were found for amination of the sodium dinitrotolyl-3-sulphonates, dissolved in the spent liquor from the purification of trinitrotoluene by the sodium sulphite process. With methylamine as reagent, one ton of crude trinitrotoluene yields 61.2 lbs. of dinitro-3-N-methyl toluidines. The nitration of the dinitro-3-N-methyltoluidines by nitric acid and mixed acids has been investigated. The reaction conditions for optimum yield in these various nitrating agents have been set. According to one of these processes, one ton of crude trinitrotoluene would give 61.3 lbs. of m-methyl-tetryl.
thesis.creator: Paquette, Roland.
thesis.subject: Chemistry.
thesis.title: The preparation of 2,4,6-trinitrotolyl-3-methyl nitramine from the waste liquor obtained in the purification of T.N.T.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: We must always carefully distinguish between the explanation of the existence of interest and the condemnation of, or apology for, interest. In this thesis I shall try to isolate the explanations of the nature and origin of interest, according to the various theories, from the answers to the subsidiary questions: Ought interest to exist at all? (a) If not, can we abolish it, and how? (b) If so, what is the proper policy that statesmen should have in regard to interest on capital? [...]
thesis.creator: Randolph, John Harrison.
thesis.subject: Interest.
thesis.title: Some theories of interest.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: This paper reports a study of the accuracy of (1) the direct, (2) the by-difference, (3) the graphical, and (4) the regression methods of determining digestibility coefficients of the individual feeds of mixed pig rations. In practically all cases the graphical and regression methods gave the more reliable results. It is suggested that either of these two statistical methods be used in preference to more commonly employed methods for determining the digestibility coefficients of individual feeds usually fed in mixed rations. A critical review of other factors causing variability of digestibility coefficients is given.
thesis.creator: Whiting, Frank.
thesis.subject: Nutrition.
thesis.title: Factors affecting the reliability of digestibility coefficients of livestock feeds.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Suspensions of bone marrow and spleen cells from 9-10 wk old C3H male mice were glutaraldehyde-fixed, syringed onto gelatin-coated silver membranes, dehydrated in ethanol, infiltrated with amyl acetate, critical point dried, coated with gold-palladium and examined with a scanning electron microscope. Cell recovery on the membranes exceeded 87%. Spleen small lymphocyte populations, in bath small lymphocyte-enriched fractions and whole spleen suspensions showed unimodal distribution curves for cell diameter (mode, 3.60 µm), and microvilli number (mode, 65). [...]

Des suspensions de moelle osseuse et de cellules de la rate provenant de souris males C3H, âgées de 9-10 semaines sont fixées au glutaradé-hyde, déposées sur des membranes de gélatine recouvertes d'argent déshydratées à éthanol, infiltrées par l'amyl acétate, séchées "au point critique", recouvertes d'or-palladium, et examinées au microscope électronique à balayage. Plus de 871 des cellules sont récupérées sur les membranes. Les populations de petits lymphocytes de la rate, à la fois les fractions riches en petits lymphocytes et les suspensions de l'ensemble de la rate montrent des courbes de distribution unimodales, en fonction du diamètre des cellules (Mode. 3.6 µm) et du nombre de microvillosités (Mode, 65). […]
thesis.creator: Kammerer, William A.
thesis.subject: Anatomy.
thesis.title: Scanning electron microscopy of bone marrow lymphocytes.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Dans le cadre d'une étude "avant-après" visant à mesurer les changements apportés par l'introduction de l'assurance-maladie fin 1970 à Montréal la présente enquête constituant une première phase, ("avant"), est une étude descriptive de la consommation des médicaments au début de 1971. 91.55% des 1,089 adresses constituant un échantillon représentatif du-Montréal métropolitain ont donné lieu à des entrevues. […]

In the framework of a “before-after” study with the purpose of evaluating the changes generated by the implementation of the Health Insurance Plan in November 1970 in Montreal, this first-stage "before" survey is a descriptive study of drug consumption at the beginning of 1971. Among the 1,089 addresses taken as a representative sample of metropolitan Montreal, 91.55% led to interviews. […]
thesis.creator: Heneman, Bernard.
thesis.subject: Epidemiology.
thesis.title: Enquête sur la consommation des médicaments à Montréal.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Cette étude a pour but de déterminer la distribution des labrocytes (mastzellan) dans le poumon du singe Rhésus, ce dernier étant fréquemment utilise comme modèle expérimental pour l’asthme et où les labrocytes sont d’une grande importance dans cette maladie. […]

This study was undertaken to determine the distribution of mast cells in the monkey lung because rhesus monkeys are often used as experimental models of asthma, and mast cells are of great importance in the disease. Lungs from five Macaca fascicularis monkeys were used. Four were inflated with alcoholic formalin fixative and one was dissected fresh to obtain materials for electron microscopy. Representative, sections were taken from the trachea, bronchi and each lobe, and mast cells were counted at different levels of airway walls paying particular attention to their relationship with eosinophils and nerves. […]
thesis.creator: Guerzon, Godfrey M.
thesis.subject: Pathology.
thesis.title: Mast cell distribution in the monkey lung.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Small lymphocytes within the developing mouse Ehrlich ascites tumor and host spleens represent newly formed cells predominantly from the bone marrow. In the present study, these cells were further characterized radioautographically on the basis of two surface markers, IgM for B cells and theta antigen for T cells. A direct binding of 125I-labelled anti-IgM detected natural surface IgM, while an indirect binding following a prior exposure to anti-theta antibody detected theta antigen. Cells remaining unlabeled with the latter procedure were considered to lack both markers (double negative).

Les petits lymphocytes des tumeurs ascites d'Ehrlich développées chez la souris, et, dans la rate 'de l'hôte sont essentiellement des cellules jeunes provenant de la moelle osseuse. Le travail présenté a permis de caractériser ces cellules, par radioautographie, en utilisant deux "marqueurs de surface", IgM pour les cellules B, et les antigènes Ɵ pour les cellules T. La fixation, directe d'anti-IgM marquées par 125I a permis de détecter les IgM de surface, alors qu'une fixation indirecte, après une préinotibation avec des anticorps anti-Ɵ permet de détecter li antigène Ɵ.
thesis.creator: Garnis, Sylvia G.
thesis.subject: Anatomy.
thesis.title: Surface markers of small lymphocytes appearing in the mouse ehrlich ascites tumor and host spleens.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Le développement embryologique et les mécanismes croissance du squelette périphérique du mammifère sont révisés. On y revoit également les techniques d'évaluation de la nasse osseuse. On y discute la technique de l'autoradiographies et son application à l'étude de la cybernétique cellulaire et de la migration des cellules. […]

The embryological development and growth mechanisms of the peripheral mammalian skeleton are reviewed. Techniques to assess bone mass are reviewed. The technique of autoradiography and its application to the study of cell kinetics and cell migration is discussed. The experimental work presented utilizes autoradiography to assess mitotic division in the periosteal and growth plate cell pools in the growing rat. The effect of the administration of exogenous estrogen on the mitotic division of these populations in the growing female rat is studied by the autoradiographic technique.
thesis.creator: Conochie, Larry B.
thesis.subject: Experimental Surgery.
thesis.title: The autoradiographic assessment of periosteal and epiphyseal plate cell populations during bone growth in the rat.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Dans le cadre d'un projet d'étude des maladies génétiques du tissu conjonctif chez l'homme, nous avons mis au point une technique d'analyse de la structure primaire du collagène. Nous ayons soumis des échantillons d'un mg des collagènes humains de type I, II, et III ainsi que des chaines a1(I) et a2 à une p digestions par la clôstridiopeptidase A. Les petits peptides ainsi obtenus ont été analysés par chromatographie en phase liquide à haute pression. Les profils d'élution obtenus forment des cartes peptidiques spécifiques qui sont liées a la structure primaire de chaque type de collagène étudié. […]

With a view to facilitating the study of human genetic connective tissue diseases we have developed a technique of analyzing the primary structure of collagen. One mg samples of purified human type I, II, and III collagens and a1 (I) and a2 chains were digested with clostridiopeptidase A and the released peptides analyzed by ion exchange high pressure liquid chromatography. Specific fingerprints were produced for each type of collagen. The specificity of these fingerprints appeared to be related to the primary structure of these collagens. […]
thesis.creator: Cole, William G.
thesis.subject: Surgery.
thesis.title: A study of human collagen utilizing bacterial collagenase digestion and high pressure liquid chromatography.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: A stratified random sample of 169 students aged 13 to 18 years, selected from a teenage high-school population of 1,407, was studied at rest and on a bicycle ergometer. Measurements included lung volume, flow rates, single breath diffusing capacity and exercise cardiac output (by nitrous oxide uptake technique), heart rate, oxygen uptake and ventilation. Two-thirds of the students returned the following year for restudy. Significant sex differences in this battery of tests were present by age years. […]

L’étude a porté sur un échantillon stratifie pour âge, choisies parmi une population de 1,407 jeunes adolescents au niveau d’une école secondaire, et étudie au repos et sur une bicyclette d’exercice. Les unités de mesure comprenaient les volumes du poumon, les débits respiratoires, la capacité de diffusion d’une simple respiration, le débit cardiaque de l’exercice (par la technique de consommation de protoxyde d’aeote), la fréquence cardiaque, la consommation d’oxygène et la ventilation. […]
thesis.creator: Seely, Janet E.
thesis.subject: Epidemiology and Health.
thesis.title: The influence of sex and growth on resting and exercise cardiorespiratory function in adolescence.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: L’object de cette étude est d’élucider les bases morphologique et métaboliques d’ARDS et de cela les indices possibles pour des meilleure noyens thérapeutiques. Avant et après une période variable d’occlusion alvéolaire st/ou vasculaire, ou l’oblitération alvéolaire avec hypoxémie les effets sur l’histologie, ultrastructure, ATP, ADP, ATP/ADP, glycogen et lactate des poumons de 58 chiens étaient étudis. […]

The purpose of this study is to elucidate the metabolic and morphologic basis of ARDS, and from this, possible glues to better therapy. In 58 dogs, both before and after a variable period of alveolar and/or vascular occlusion, or alveolar obliteration plus hypoxemia, the effects on lung histology, ultrastructure, ATP, ADP, ATP/ADP ratio, glycogen and lactate are studied. […]
thesis.creator: Modry, Dennis L.
thesis.subject: Experimental Surgery.
thesis.title: Lung metabolism and morphology in respiratory failure.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Un antigène tumorale inhibant l’adhérence des leucocytes en tubes de verre fut développe pour détecter et étudier la réponse cellulaire immunitaire a des antigènes associes aux tumeurs d’adénocarcinome du sein et autres. […]

A tumour antigen induced inhibition of leukocyte adherence to glass (LAI) was developed for use with test tubes (t.t.) to detect and study cell mediated immune response to tumour associated antigens (TAA) of human breast adenocarcinoma and other malignancies. Peripheral blood leukocytes (PBL) of cancer patients were incubated in glass t.t. with saline extracts and after two hours incubation, the present non-adherence cells was determined. Sensitized PBL of breast cancer patients showed non-adherence in the presence of breast cancer extracts but not to unrelated tumour extracts or normal breast tissue, or unrelated malignancies. […]
thesis.creator: Marti, Jose R.
thesis.subject: Experimental Surgery.
thesis.title: Tumor immunology in early cancer detection: L. A. I.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Le choc hémorragique produit des modifications du métabolisme de cAMP qui sont potentiellement dangereux pour la cellule. Nous avons procède a une étude -expérimentale chez le chien en vue d’examiner l'hypothèse que l'administration de cAMP exogène peut Avoir des effets bénéfiques sur la situation hémodynamique de choc. […]

Hemorrhagic shock induces potentially damaging alterations in the metabolism of cyclic AMP, which is an intracellular second messenger for many hormones. The hypothesis that the administration of exogenous cAMP might have salutary effects on cardiovascular hemodynamics in shock was tested in canine experiments. Intravenous bolus injection of dibutyryl cyclic AMP (2 mg/kg) produced hyperglycemia but no changes occurred in heart rate, arterial pressure, cardiac output or left ventricular dp/dt. The findings were similar in both conscious and anesthetized (Nembutal) normotensive dogs, l dogs after three hours of shock (at B. P. 40 mmHg), and after reinfusion of the shed blood. The only hemodynamic change noted was a transient hypotension upon injection of massive doses of db-cAMP (10 mg/kg). The implications of these findings in light of earlier reported hemodynamic effects of cAMP are discussed.
thesis.creator: MacRae, Martha.
thesis.subject: Experimental Surgery.
thesis.title: Effects of exogenous cyclic AMP of the canine cardiovascular system in hemorrhagic shock.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Des rats adultes dont les testicules ont été irradies, ont, été utilisés, dans le but de vérifier l'existence d'une chalone testiculaire pouvant agir sur, la phase G2 des spermatogonies en division. A 12 jours après irradiation les animaux on étés injectés d'un extrait testiculaire de rat normaux, d'un extrait de foie ou d'une solution saline. Les mitoses ont été comptes dans les tube séminifères isoles, colores et montes "in toto".

Adult rats with X-irradiated testes were used to test the existence of a G2 spermatogonial chalone. On the 12th day following irradiation, the animals were injected intraperitoneally with an extract of normal rat testis or liver, or saline. Ten hours later they were sacrificed and whole mounts of seminiferous tubules were prepared. […]
thesis.creator: McLaren, Margaret J.
thesis.subject: Anatomy.
thesis.title: Testicular chalones in the rat
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: The thesis describes an experimental study of the pressure distribution beneath the human forefoot during the stance phase of the gait cycle. An outline of the development of current views on foot function and its investigation is given. The experimental protocol for measuring the pressure beneath selected points of the forefoot using sub-miniature pressure transducers is described and the findings in a group of normal subjects detailed. […]

Cette thèse décrie une étude expérimentale de la distribution de la pression génères sous le pied antérieur humain durant la phase de "stance" dans le cycle de marche. Un résume du développement des idées courantes la fonction et investigation est donnée. […]
thesis.creator: Horan, F. T.
thesis.subject: Experimental Surgery.
thesis.title: The pressure distribution beneath the forefoot during walking.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Cette œuvre avait pour but le mesurèrent direct des niveaux endogènes des androgènes dans le sérum et les tissus du fétu humain. Les échantillons étaient analysés par compétitive protéine-binding à la protéine de liaison des hormones sexuelles aussi bien avant qu’après fractionnement des androgènes dans un system de chromatographie automatique utilisant le Sephadex LH-20. Donc on mesurait les androgènes non-lieu ainsi que le testostérone et le dihydrotestosterone. […]

This work set out to measure directly the endogenous androgens in serum and tissues of the human fetus. Samples were analyzed by competitive protein-binding to sex-hormone-binding-globulin both before and after fractionation of the androgens in an automated chromatography system using Sephadex LH-20. Total unconjugated androgens as well as testosterone and dihydrotestosterone were measured in this way. […]
thesis.creator: Diez D’Aux, Robert C.
thesis.subject: Experimental Medicine.
thesis.title: Androgens in the human fetus.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.

thesis.description: Ischemia of the inner layers of the myocardium during cardiopulmonary bypass (CPB) is a major cause of mortality during and following surgery for acquired heart disease (18, 36, 41, 58, 71). Myocardial hypertrophy and ventricular fibrillation are present in most clinical cases and have been shown experimentally to be important contributing factors. Other factors have recently received attention (1, 14). These include lesions of the heart in which oxygen consumption of the myocardium is increased, e.g., aortic stenosis. especially after prolonged CPB (18), Ischemic arrest of the heart during CPB (15), unbalanced coronary artery perfusion (58), increased tissue pressure from surface to deeper areas of the myocardium (5, 6, 7, 8, 9), and decreased oxygen tension from epicardium to endocardium (30), with a concurrent decrease in blood flow to the deeper areas (1, 11, 37). […]

L'ischémie des couches profondes du myocardie pendant le pontage cardiopulmonaire est une cause principale de mortalité pendant la période chirurgicale et post-chirurgicale dans les maladies cardiaques acquises. Les facteurs principaux contribuant à la mortalité sont l'hypertrophie du myocarde et la fibrillation ventriculaire. Dernièrement, d'autres facteurs ont été précisés comme facteurs contribuant aux, lésions du myocarde qui exige une plus grande consommation d'oxygène. Ce sont sténose de l'aorte, surtout après perfusion extra-corporèlle, déséquilibre électrolytique de la perfusion coronarienne, augmentation des tensions tissulaire entre les couches superficiel le et profonde du myocarde, et diminution de la tension d'oxygène progressive à travers l'épaisseur du myocarde. […]
thesis.creator: Salerno, Tomas A.
thesis.subject: Experimental Surgery.
thesis.title: Myocardial blood flow during cardiopulmonary bypass using the roller and the pulsatile pumps.
thesis.rights: All items in eScholarship@McGill are protected by copyright with all rights reserved unless otherwise indicated.
